featured.text: Bullard, having witnessed the life-saving power of the metal helmet in the War, decided to produce a head protection device that was affordable for every worker and lightweight enough to be worn all day long.

definition.zh_def: 頭盔；用於保護頭部的裝備，通常在騎自行車、摩托車或進行某些運動時佩戴。
definition.en_def: A protective headgear worn to prevent injuries, commonly used in activities like cycling, motorcycling, or certain sports.
definition.example: He wore a helmet while riding his bicycle for safety.
